text: The 2017 World Match Racing Tour was a series of match racing sailing regattas staged during 2017 season.http://www.sailingscuttlebutt.com/2016/12/22/world- match-racing-tour-announces-2017-plan/ Torvar Mirsky won the finals and became 2017 World Champions.http://wmrt.com/steele-and-robertson-square-up-for- battle-of-the-bridge-copy/ == Regattas == {| class="wikitable" |- !
